title: 📌 Earner Community – Important Rules & Conditions
content:
Please follow these rules carefully. If you break any rule, your activation can be rejected or show as "Not Showing".

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

🔐 Joining Condition:

If any app link goes to Play Store, you must follow these rules:

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📲 Play Store Link Rules:

1. You must complete the full process on the **same mobile** where you opened the link.

2. You **cannot use two devices** (don't switch phones in between or after joining).

3. These links are **tracking links**. If you change your mobile or break the process, it will not track and you won't get credit.

4. Complete the registration and verification process fully.

5. Take a clear screen recording of the entire process.

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

📋 Video Recording Requirements:

• Start recording before clicking the link
• Show the complete registration process
• Include profile page with name and ID
• Video should be clear and uninterrupted
• Include mobile number in caption when submitting

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

⚠️ Rejection Reasons:

• Incorrect or unclear proof
• Improper activation process
• Using wrong device
• Late submission after deadline
• Fraud detection

━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━━

✅ Success Tips:

• Follow instructions exactly
• Use provided referral links only
• Complete on same device
• Submit within deadline
• Provide clear video proof
